title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo 'Host:'.
EB: The expected behavior is that clicking on the first Combo should result in the focus caret appearing in the first Combo 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
